titles.title: A resolution to elect Patty Murray, a Senator from the State of Washington, to be President pro tempore of the Senate of the United States.
A resolution to elect Patty Murray, a Senator from the State of Washington, to be President pro tempore of the Senate of the United States.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution elects Senator Patty Murray from Washington as the President pro tempore of the Senate.
